articles.title: ‘Tell him to shove off now’: Kiwis cry foul over Tuivasa-Sheck’s ‘act of betrayal’ - Fox Sports
articles.description: The news of Roger Tuivasa-Sheck’s defection to rugby shouldn’t have come as much of a surprise to rugby league fans, who had long been aware of the superstar’s desire to one day play for the All Blacks.
articles.content:
But it seems some in New Zealand were blown away by the 27-year-olds confirmation on Saturday.
